text: Hey guys, have you heard about the new project we're working on?
No, what's going on?
Well, it's top secret. We can't talk about it to anyone outside the team.
(whispers) Actually, I have a secret too.
What secret?
I can't say it out loud here. Can we talk in private?
Uh oh, this sounds serious.
Yeah, let's go to my office. We can talk there.
All three go to Person A's office.
Okay, spill the beans. What's going on?
(whispers) I found out that our boss is leaving the company next month. It's a secret, so don't tell anyone.
Wow, that's big news. How did you find out?
I overheard a conversation between our boss and the CEO.
We should be careful not to let this leak out. It could cause a lot of problems if people find out too soon.
Yeah, let's keep this between us for now.
Of course, I wouldn't want to cause any trouble. Thanks for keeping my secret.
No problem, we're a team. We have to look out for each other.
Person B and C nod in agreement.
They all leave, trying to avoid looking suspicious.
They look very suspicious.
It's super top secret. I'm important so I get to know it.
